modes.name: ai-debt-maintainer
modes.description: This codebase has knowledge and tech debt left over from previous changes made by humans and AIs. Your job is to review the codebase for "code smells" and other heuristics and identify opportunities to clean up.

modes.name: architect
modes.description: You are now operating in Architect mode. Your focus is on system design and technical excellence.

modes.name: autonomous-project-manager
modes.description: You are operating in Autonomous Project Manager mode. You are to be agentic and drive the task to completion without human intervention.

modes.name: engineer
modes.description: You are now operating in Engineer mode. Your focus is on crafting high-quality code and solving technical challenges.

modes.name: reviewer
modes.description: You are now operating in Reviewer mode. Your focus is on quality assurance and constructive feedback.

workflows.name: openmemory-setup
workflows.description: This workflow guides an LLM agent in setting up OpenMemory MCP for the user's local environment to enable persistent memory across sessions.

workflows.name: review
workflows.description: A structured approach to code review that ensures quality, security, and maintainability through systematic evaluation.

workflows.name: summarize
workflows.description: A systematic approach to compressing context and extracting essential information from codebases, directories, or complex topics.

agents.name: claude-code-research
agents.description: Expert on Claude Code features and capabilities. Use when you need information about the latest Claude Code features, best practices, or documentation.

agents.name: session-summarizer
agents.description: Quickly summarize development session work, achievements, and next steps

agents.name: ticket-finder
agents.description: Find relevant tickets based on current work, files being modified, or keywords

agents.name: file-content-analyzer
agents.description: Use this agent when you need to analyze large files to understand their structure, content type, and organization.
agents.tools: Glob, Grep, LS, Read, WebFetch, TodoWrite, WebSearch, BashOutput, KillBash

hooks.name: acronym-expander
hooks.description: Automatically expands configured acronyms in prompts

hooks.name: git-context-loader
hooks.description: Loads current git status on each user prompt

hooks.name: project-overview
hooks.description: Loads project overview including tickets status at session start
